# allAnchors

**Instance Property**

An array of all the image anchors the provider is tracking.

## Declaration

```swift
final var allAnchors: [ImageAnchor] { get }
```

## Inspecting an image-tracking provider

- **state**: The current status of data coming from a provider.
- **description**: A textual representation of this image tracking provider.
